name: ScreeningMammographyAndDBTStudies
title: Screening Mammography and DBT Studies
description: This value set is associated with the "Breast Cancer Screening Recall Rates" measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (OQR) Program. It is also referred to as "OP-39."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with screening studies used to identify breast cancer in men and women.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who underwent a screening mammography or screening digital breast tomosynthesis (DBT).),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes that identify breast screening imaging studies performed using traditional mammography or DBT are captured in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with breast screening are excluded from this value set. Similarly, codes from alternative terminologies other than CPT are excluded from this value set.)

concept.display: Screening digital breast tomosynthesis, bilateral (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
Screening mammography, bilateral (2-view study of each breast), including computer-aided detection (CAD) when performed

Screening mammography, bilateral (2-view study of each breast), including computer-aided detection (CAD) when performed
